Articles.Content:
Hey fellow Kerbonauts!!!

 

So I have a problem. I want to set up telemachus with another pc. On the laptop where I run KSP on, everything works fine, no problem.

Then I go to my pc, put the good link in the adress bar (with the  IP adress of my laptop of course). But it says that the IP adress denied acces.

What do i do wrong!? 

Thanks in advance!

You will need to open the config.xml in GameData\Telemachus\Plugins\PluginData\Telemachus\ and configure the IP and port to what you want.  I think with -1 it defaults to loopback only.  Then you'll need to open the port on your firewall.
